name: Art City The Video Game
description:
Art City: The Video Game!

You are on a journey to reach Art City. Avoid enemies and collect items on your way!

You can control your character with the Arrow Keys and pressing A to talk with the people you meet!

Controllers are also supported! Left stick for movement, A to talk, B to jump.

Other controls:
- F for fullscreen
- Ctrl for menu (in a level)

This game was created as a collaboration between Art City (located at 616 Broadway, Winnipeg MB) and Ralf Sawazki.

All art in this game was created by hand by participants at the free art programming at Art City, or by myself or my wife, Sam (when a small thing here or there was needed that was not created at Art City).
